Detailed Description

Describes a rectangle define by the top/left corner and the right/bottom corner.

BOOLEAN Rect::IsEmpty (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns:
TRUE if the rectangle is empty. A rectangle is defined as empty, if GetRight() < GetLeft() or GetTop() < GetBottom()
